pullrequest.title: Made QFileDialoge open faster by replacing QFileDialog exec_ with getOpenFileNames

content.raw:
To be honest I have no idea why this is the case. And googeling didn't help here.

Since creating the pull request I tried the change on a few different machines running different windows 7 and macOS.
And results really seem to var, but I have not encountered a case where this caused a slow down.

As for pictures I can currently only provide ones from macOS (where there is no change).
I'll add ones for Windows on Monday. 
As for linux someone else would need to make those.
![sidebyside.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/AeyynE/images/249148882-sidebyside.png)
content.html:
To be honest I have no idea why this is the case. And googeling didn't help here.

Since creating the pull request I tried the change on a few different machines running different windows 7 and macOS. And results really seem to var, but I have not encountered a case where this caused a slow down.

As for pictures I can currently only provide ones from macOS (where there is no change). I'll add ones for Windows on Monday. As for linux someone else would need to make those.
